LayoutNode.Content: CL about > help > paid posting accounts
LayoutNode.SRC:
CLabout>help>

paid posting accounts

LayoutNode.Content: Paid posting account features: Tools for managing paid postings ( list of paid posting types/areas ). Multiple authorized users can be set up on a single account. Pre-purchase blocks of postings —avoid entering credit card information for each posting. Invoicing (requires $2000 minimum purchase within last 3 months). Pay invoices online. (Note: paid posting accounts, while useful, are not required.) Application process: Complete the online application form . Contact craigslist accounting staff after completing application. Pay for block of postings. Account activation. Turnaround time is usually one (1) business day, but please allow up to seven (7) business days.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Paid posting account features:

Tools for managing paid postings (list of paid posting types/areas).
  • Multiple authorized users can be set up on a single account.
    • Pre-purchase blocks of postings—avoid entering credit card information for each posting.
  • Invoicing (requires $2000 minimum purchase within last 3 months).
  • Pay invoices online.

    • (Note: paid posting accounts, while useful, are not required.)

    Application process:

    Complete the online application form.
  • Contact craigslist accounting staff after completing application.
  • Pay for block of postings.
  • Account activation.

    • Turnaround time is usually one (1) business day, but please allow up to seven (7) business days.
